item.title: Docker配置环境
item.description: docker配置python环境 docker 环境遇到的问题 Got permission denied while trying to connect to the Docker daemon socket 需要给docker进程777的权限 Reference Got permission denied while trying to connect to the Docker daemon socket at unix:///var/run/docker.sock
